articles.author: Olly Allen
articles.title: Family involved in horror Commonwealth Games cycling crash say it was nearly 'complete catastrophe' - Daily Mail
articles.description: In the second qualifying heat of the men's 15km scratch qualifying on Sunday, a high-speed, multi-rider collision saw England's Matt Walls fly over the barrier and into the crowd, with his bike.
articles.content:
The family involved in a horror cycling crash at the Commonwealth Games say that they were only 'millimetres' away from a 'complete catastrophe'.

articles.title: Man United keen on Stuttgart's Sasa Kalajdzic and hold talks with RB Salzburg over Benjamin Sesko - Daily Mail
articles.description: The club have also spoken to Red Bull Salzburg regarding Slovenian wonderkid Benjamin Sesko but remain reluctant to hit the Austrian club's asking price of £55million.
articles.content:
Manchester United retain an interest in Stuttgart striker Sasa Kalajdzic as they look to strengthen their forward line.
